short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will change your default search to https://protectedsearch.antimalwarecloud.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
★★ Protect your PC against dangerous websites. 100% FREE FOREVER! ★★

UTILILAB ProtectedSEARCH protects end users from malicious sites that can be returned by search engines. We utilise search assets from Bing to deliver excellent search results, which are all validated against our leading edge AntiMalware URL cloud. Known infected sites are alerted to the user by a protective popup.

UTILILAB ProtectedSEARCH provides an automated, all-in-one solution for your PC at no cost:
★ Protection against MALICIOUS & DANGEROUS Websites even in HTTPS
★ Detailed Information about Threat Sites
★ Anti-Malware Technology from leading Internet Security Companies
★ Integration directly into your Chrome Browser for your Security
